name: Bubble Cats Rescue
description:
Experience an adventure and join Alice the Cat as she races around the world to free all of her baby kitties!
They need your help! Rescue them from the evil bubbles. You’ll need to be skillful and accurate.

With awesome next-generation physics, spectacular chain reactions, amazing power-ups and countless levels... Bubble Cats Rescue takes your gaming experience to the next level.

Start your adventure today. Shoot the bubbles!

In BUBBLE CATS RESCUE you will find:

* Over 100 levels to beat in 5 amazing environments!

* Adorable and cute characters
* Relaxing and refreshing background music
* Smooth bubble shooting experience
* Easy and fun to play, but hard and rewarding to master
* Amazing power-ups, boosts and special bubbles
